channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kim Kardashian's Bestie Allison Statter Accidentally Sets Her Hair on Fire While Blowing Out Her Birthday Cake Candles
item.description: Kardashian shared the clip on Instagram on Sunday, Jan 11, with the caption, "You are on fire, baby!!!"

item.title: Alix Earle Reveals Her Mom Was Diagnosed with Breast Cancer While She Competed on “DWTS”
item.description: "Go momma! So proud and inspired by you," the internet personality wrote on social media

item.title: Who Was “Today” Host Sheinelle Jones' Husband? All About the Late Uche Ojeh
item.description: Sheinelle Jones' late husband Uche Ojeh, who she married in 2007 and welcomed three children with, died in May 2025

item.title: “Perfect Match ”Stars Amber Desiree 'AD' Smith and Ollie Sutherland Welcome Their First Baby Together
item.description: The reality TV stars announced they were expecting a baby together back in May
